messages.subject: Re: Nudity harms kids over 3????
messages.msgSnippet: I think it must have a lot to do with parents attitudes about nudity and whether children are comfortable enough to ask questions if they wonder about things
messages.messageBody:
I think it must have a lot to do with parents attitudes about nudity
and whether children are comfortable enough to ask questions if they
wonder about things such as why their own genitalia look different, etc.

So many people are uncomfortable with nudity and ofcourse kids pick up
on the discomfort :)

warmly,
jenn

http://www.livingalaska.blogspot.com

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Nudity harms kids over 3????
messages.msgSnippet: Wow.  Think this comes up in a nudist colony? In Peace, Ginger Kai(8) and Kade(6) LOVE has impact. It s not our differences that divide us. It is our
messages.messageBody:
Wow. Think this comes up in a nudist colony?

In Peace,
Ginger
Kai(8) and Kade(6)

LOVE has impact.

"It's not our differences that divide us. It is our inability to recognize, accept and celebrate those differences." - Audre Lorde
